titles.title: I Claim The Power Of The Blood Of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I claim the power of the blood of Jesus
Shed on Calvary,
It's mine to take dominion
Over every enemy;
I am covered from my head to toe,
Immersed within that crimson flow,
And I command you now, O foe,
In Jesus' name be gone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For the power of His blood has set me free,
So free, so free,
For the power of His blood has set me free,
Free from every enemy.
